name: DAOvc
additional_notices: Kindly be aware of liquidity-related risks. This notice is not directed at any project in particular, and is more of a cautionary reminder.

description.en: By having a low amount of capital of as little as $1, users can invest like market participants having over $1,000,000 via the creation of a common pool of contributors acting as token holders.
